Producer: David Gross, Macdara Kelleher, Andre Rouleau
Production Co: No Trace Camping, Caramel Films, Fastnet Films
Rating: PG-13 (Partial Nudity|Language|Sexual Content Throughout|Sexual References Throughout)
Synopsis: A medical-school dropout (Daniel Radcliffe) tries to hide his attraction to his new friend (Zoe Kazan), a bubbly artist who already has a boyfriend.
Title: What If
